text: The Players Championship is a snooker tournament. It was the Players Tour Championship Finals from 2011 to 2016. From 2017 it was just the Players Champonship. It is one of three events in the Players Series. It has the top 16 players from the one-year list. == Winners == Year Winner Runner-up Final score Venue City Season Players Tour Championship Finals (ranking, 2011–2016) 2011 4–0 The Helix Dublin, Ireland 2010/11 2012 4–0 Bailey Allen Hall Galway, Ireland 2011/12 2013 4–3 2012/13 2014 4–0 Preston Guild Hall Preston, England 2013/14 2015 4–3 Montien Riverside Hotel Bangkok, Thailand 2014/15 2016 10–6 EventCity Manchester, England 2015/16 Players Championship (ranking, 2017–present) 2017 10–8 Venue Cymru Llandudno, Wales 2016/17 2018 10–4 2017/18 2019 10–4 Preston Guild Hall Preston, England 2018/19 2020 10–4 Southport Theatre and Convention Centre Southport, England 2019/20 2021 10–3 Marshall Arena Milton Keynes, England 2020/21 2022 10–5 Aldersley Leisure Village Wolverhampton, England 2021/22 2023 10–4 2022/23 2024 10–8 Telford International Centre Telford, England 2023/24 == References == == Other websites == * Category:Snooker tournaments
title: Players Championship (snooker)
